message:
Hi,
I am Middle-European student of theoretical informatics and psychology, seeking opportunity to spend first half of 2012 scripting in Indonesia. Since my transition to informatics is recent, strong learning abilities and rough experience in Python are beside theoretical knowledge currently the only skills I can offer. However, I believe to be able to gain whatever demanded competencies (OSs, DBMSs...) till the year-end.

If you know somebody who might want me, let me know, please.

Regards,

Vojtech
( vojtechpisl (at) hotmail.com )
